pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Example PackageThis is a simple example package. You can use[Github-flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/)to write your content.```python3 -m buildpython3 -m twine upload dist/* --verbose```On the folder where pyproject.toml is located run the following commands```python3 -m venv publishing_environmentpython3 -m pip install --upgrade pippython3 -m pip install --upgrade buildpython3 -m buildpython3 -m pip install --upgrade twinepython -m twine upload dist/* --verbose ```
